Title: Establishes composting programs at state university of New York and city university of New York campuses
Summary: Requires the establishment of a composting program at the state university of New York, the city university of New York and institutions subject to the jurisdiction of SUNY or CUNY.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing composting programs at state university of New York and city university of New York campuses
